## Summary
Describe the feature and the problem it solves.

## Use Case
What is the user need and workflow?

## Proposal
Outline the desired API changes or new endpoints.

## Alternatives
List alternative solutions considered.

## NetBox Context
Relevant NetBox OpenAPI or endpoints.

## Additional context
Anything else that would be helpful.
